RelatedSentence: The Ministry of Labour , Industrial Relations and Employment has commended close to 600 employers around Fiji for implementing the national minimum wage of $ 2 per hour .
Labour Minister - Jone Usamate says Labour inspectors visited the employers between March and April and did not find any case of employers paying below the minimum wage rate .
